channel.title: Random Pokemon Generator Feed
channel.description: Learn about updates to the website.

item.title: A big update to the Random Pokemon Generator
item.description: A really big update !! I added a lot more filter options and many show options, and improved the showing of pokemons, to make it more fun and interesting. Go try it now https://randompokegen.cc/, hope you have fun. Looking forward to your feedback and suggestions!

item.title: A big update to the Random Pokemon Generator
item.description: I added a lot more filters to the Random Pokemon Generator, and i hope it useful for you. Go try it now https://randompokegen.cc/, hope you have fun. Looking forward to your feedback and suggestions!

item.title: Add More Option panel for the Random Pokemon Generator
item.description: I added a More-Option-Panel to the Random Pokemon Generator, to make it easier to operate and Keep a clean and simple interface! Hope you like it! Looking forward to your feedback and suggestions!

item.title: More Filters for the Random Pokemon Generator
item.description: I added more filters to the Random Pokemon Generator, including a filter for the region of the Pokemon, the ability of the Pokemon, and the type of the Pokemon.

item.title: A new Random Pokemon Generator borned
item.description: I'm happy to announce the birth of a new Random Pokemon Generator! This website is a project I've been working on for a while, and I'm excited to see it grow and become more useful to the community.
